flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction_rendered:
Relevant parts
  • Chi-qoo Power Pack Kit
Tools
  • #1 philips screw driver
  • Wood Glue or Epoxy
guide.summary: This guide will cover the assembly process off a BootstrapSolar Chi-qoo, a DIY solar power pack capable of powering or charing small devices such as phones, MP3 players, tablets (including iPads), ebook readers, reading lights, Arduino boards, and much mo
guide.title: Assembling a Chi-qoo Solar Power Pack Kit
